enWisdom: The bane of certitude is doubt

Wisdom: كُلُّ مَا خَلَا الْيَقِينَ ظَنٌّ وَشُكُوكٌ
enWisdom: Everything that is devoid of certitude is [mere] conjecture and dubiety
One whose certitude is strong does not [have any] doubt
Certitude is an excellent dispeller of doubt

Wisdom: هَلَكَ مَنْ بَاعَ الْيَقِينَ بِالشَّكِّ وَالْحَقَّ بِالْبَاطِلِ وَالْآجِلَ بِالْعَاجِلِ
enWisdom: One who sells certitude for doubt, truth for falsehood, and the Hereafter for this world is destroyed
